content: From Frank at AlpenCoin comes his first scam coin:FTX "Scam Bankman-Fried" 1oz silver coin40 coins produced..... 1 winner and 39 REKT Â Load per person will be 0.001BTC plus coin price & shippingThis will make the winning coin have a load of 0.04BTC Â Once all coins are sold, Frank will send the winning load randomly to one of the coins using the blockchain to select the winnerCOIN ADDRESSES:Code: RESERVATIONS:1 - JanEmil2 - krogothmanhattan3 - Primo-bit4 - comit5 - PeakDK6 - Kryptowerk7 - minerjones8 - Markzellers9 - PreciousMetapsICT10 - MoparMiningLLC11 - YodasRedRocket12 - owlcatz13 - bigtimespaghetti14 - geophphreigh15 - heisty16 - Bullion-n-BTC17 - Cryptogreatdane18 - BTCOVERFIATS19 - QuakerBull20 - ChiBitCTy21 - tweetious22 - Cryptocanuk23 - DirtyBirdE24 - Steeley25 - tread9326 - Spokanistan5127 - mortare28 - dozerz29 - Agrawas30 - pinky123431 - Est201332 - MrCryptHodl33 - stackinsats77734 - SatsLife35 - hotdog736 - sunnybwoy37 - Humble Bitcoiners38 - rsincognito39 - Suzuki Matt40 - Frank AlpenCoinExtra's list:DernosteMrMojoRising26CassiousCyrusseek3rSurfinPandaithd1AT101EThenkcryptotankchronicskyyesbitcoinyesgoldlyre**All previous people who showed interest have preference on their reservation.Once it has been confirmed from original interests if they do or do not want the coin, the extra reservations will be allocated per timed requestPlease reply here or in PM if you are still interested and let me know which coin number you would like****PRICE: 0.0027BTC ($69) + 0.001BTC + shipping**

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: rsincognito on August 31, 2023, 07:09:29 PM#33 please sir.edit:Â  if you are not the winnerÂ  you can still later load this coin with btc and keep it correct? you would have to peel it to see if you are the winner - there is nothing linking which address goes to which coin. The addresses are guaranteed to match the PK's used but there is no record of which PK was put on which coin - was done randomly - so the only way to know if you win is to peel the coin and load the PK into a wallet. That said, you could then generate a new PK and address pair and load the coin yourself.Anyone wanting to do this, let me know and I can supply a new Alpen DIY hologram.
